titleStmt.title: The Christians dayly solace in experimentall observations; or, cordials for crosses in thse sad and calamitous times of affliction. By R.H.
titleStmt.author: Head, Richard, Rev.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Skelton, at the Hand and Bible in Duck-Lane; Isaac Pridmore at the Golden Falcon, near the New Exchange; and Henry Marsh at the Princes Arms in Chancery-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.
